title: Tech News: Twitter Shareholders Vote on Acquisition Today
itunes:title: Tech News: Twitter Shareholders Vote on Acquisition Today
description:
Twitter's shareholders are expected to approve Elon Musk's proposed Twitter acquisition even as Musk continues to try and extricate himself from the deal. Meta spins off the PyTorch project into a new, independent foundation. Square Enix announces that a computer game is going to shut down prematurely. And much more!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Twitter's shareholders are expected to approve Elon Musk's proposed Twitter acquisition even as Musk continues to try and extricate himself from the deal. Meta spins off the PyTorch project into a new, independent foundation. Square Enix announces that a computer game is going to shut down prematurely. And much more!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
itunes:keywords: Twitter, Elon Musk, acquisition, Meta, Google, Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, Reels, Amazon, video games, Babylon's Fall, Square Enix, games as a service, Apple, iOS, vulnerability, security patch, Loon, lasers, Nintendo, Zelda, Breath of the Wild 2, Nintendo Direct
